import './App.css'; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Dots from "./Components/Dots"; import TemplateLogo from "./Components/TemplatateLogo" const RestaurantURL = "https://random-data-api.com/api/restaurant/random_restaurant" class App extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { id: 0, name: "Franklin's Barbecue", } } componentDidMount(){ fetch(RestaurantURL) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) } handleGetRestaurantInfoClick = () => { // We will need to do something here to get new restaurant data. Note the kind of function we are using here for handling an event. } render() { return (
